title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
user_review: A masterpiece about hope, friendship, and perseverance

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
user_review: Redefines the superhero genre with outstanding performances

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.
user_review: Heartwarming story that spans decades of American history

title: The Matrix
description: A computer programmer discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation created by machines, and joins a rebellion to break free.
user_review: Revolutionary sci-fi that changed action movies forever
